description: Added sidebar menu (beta)
Added new data fields: exhumed, exhumation date and auto-added
Added link to GitHub
Home page shows fewer people
Users are now greeted with their name
Users can now change their display name
Edit button is only displayed to users with permission
Users can now check their permissions
Warnings let users know they do not have permission
Viewing non-existing people shows error banner
Added new conflict types: improvement and confirmed
Empty fields are no longer displayed
Added header link to updates
Updated conflict page when a person has no conflicts
Fixed bug when editing people
Added conflicts. Conflicts let you mark data fields as conflicting, unsure or confirmed.
Fix deployment error
Fix bug when opening page
Not found page added
This page added
Updated data fields
Data is now searchable
